page.title: 07TOURISM IN SHREWSBURY.
page.content: Tourism in Shrewsbury is at its highest peak in summer. The tourists, mostly{Americans and French}are attracted to Shrewsbury because it is a historic town. It has many historic buildings e.g. The Abbey Church, St.Chads Church the Castle and a few Tudor buildings. There is a lot of accommodation for tourists, the main {hotels}being The Lord Hill and The Prince Rupert, and there are houses which put people up for{Bed and {Breakfast.}Most tourists only stay for a few days, either on business or on vacation. Shrewsbury is clean, tidy and peaceful and only a few miles from the country side,although some people think there is too much vandalism, theft and not enough{parking facilities.
